atk-s0402a58:1_2: Dasame yo cintetvā kabyaṁ karoti, ayaṁ cintākavi nāma.
atk-s0402a58:1_3: Yo sutvā karoti, ayaṁ sutakavi nāma.
atk-s0402a58:1_4: Yo ekaṁ atthaṁ nissāya karoti, ayaṁ atthakavi nāma.
atk-s0402a58:1_5: Yo taṅkhaṇaññeva vaṅgīsatthero viya attano paṭibhānena karoti, ayaṁ paṭibhānakavi nāmāti.
